ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To forcefully remove and disable all integrated AI features and components from Windows 11 to improve user privacy, security, and system performance.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Disable Registry Keys for AI features (Copilot, Recall, etc.) â€¢ Prevent Reinstall of AI Packages via custom Windows Update package â€¢ Disable Copilot and Recall policies â€¢ Remove AI Appx Packages (including non-removable ones) â€¢ Remove Recall Optional Feature
ðŸ“– Summary: This PowerShell script is designed to remove various AI-driven features and components from Windows 11, including Copilot, Recall, and related services. It aims to enhance user experience, privacy, and security by disabling or removing these integrated AI functionalities.

ðŸš€ hours | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Effortless time tracking and reporting directly from the command line for personal projects and activities.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Command-line interface (CLI) â€¢ Text-based User Interface (TUI) â€¢ Task creation and management â€¢ Start/stop time tracking â€¢ Manual log entry addition
ðŸ“– Summary: Hours is a command-line time tracking toolkit designed for users who prefer a minimalist, keyboard-driven interface. It allows for easy creation and management of tasks, starting and stopping time tracking, and generating plaintext reports and statistics.

ðŸ”¥ anime | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Creating animations for web elements using JavaScript.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Fast, multipurpose, and lightweight â€¢ Simple yet powerful API â€¢ Works with CSS properties, SVG, DOM attributes, and JavaScript Objects
ðŸ“– Summary: Anime.js is a lightweight and versatile JavaScript animation library. It provides a simple yet powerful API for creating animations on CSS properties, SVG, DOM attributes, and JavaScript objects.

ðŸ”¥ Handy | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide a private, offline, and customizable speech-to-text solution for desktop users.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Offline speech-to-text transcription â€¢ Privacy-focused (no cloud processing) â€¢ Extensible and open-source â€¢ Cross-platform (Windows, macOS, Linux) â€¢ Configurable keyboard shortcuts
ðŸ“– Summary: Handy is a free, open-source, and extensible desktop application that provides offline speech-to-text transcription. It prioritizes privacy by processing all audio locally, allowing users to speak and have their words transcribed and pasted into any text field without cloud reliance.
